name: Kart Racing Ultimate
description:
You like Speed Racing and Adrenaline?!
"Kart Racing Ultimate" is made for you!

More than 20 Tracks are available to improve your XP!

Put your Helmet and take the control of your Kart!

Finally a Game that offers Real Kart Feelings!

And don't forget that: "Without control, Power is Nothing!"

It's up to you!

••• Game Features •••

• Full 3D Real-Time Rendering!
• 20 different Tracks!
• Incredible speed and steering sensations!
• XP Manager!
• Music by "REVENGE"!
